summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4434 for the improvement of the alley in Block 19, University Park Addition, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street, between 18th Avenue Northeast and 19th Avenue Northeast; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52354, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
